outputStyles.jobs-mode.name: Jobs Mode

migration.title: Configuration Migration
migration.migrationNeeded: Configuration migration needed for Claude Code CLI 2.0-2.1 support

max.name: Maximum Permissions
max.description: All common commands, file operations, and MCP servers

dev.name: Developer Preset
dev.description: Build tools, git, package managers, and file operations

language.label: Response Language
language.description: Language for AI responses (e.g., 'japanese', 'chinese', 'english'). Leave empty for system default.

plansDirectory.label: Plans Directory
plansDirectory.description: Custom directory for storing plan files. Leave empty for default location.

showTurnDuration.label: Show Turn Duration
showTurnDuration.description: Display the time taken for each turn in the conversation

respectGitignore.label: Respect Gitignore
respectGitignore.description: Respect .gitignore file when performing file operations

mcp.label: MCP Auto-Enable Threshold
mcp.description: Number of uses before auto-enabling an MCP server

agent.label: Default Agent
agent.description: Default agent to use for Claude Code CLI 2.0+

enabled.label: Enable Extended Thinking
enabled.description: Enable extended thinking mode for complex problem solving

budgetTokens.label: Thinking Budget Tokens
budgetTokens.description: Maximum tokens to use for thinking (default: 10240)

command.label: File Suggestion Command
command.description: Command to use for file suggestions (e.g., 'git', 'grep')

allowUnsandboxedCommands.label: Allow Unsandboxed Commands
allowUnsandboxedCommands.description: Allow execution of commands without sandboxing (dangerous)

disallowedTools.label: Disallowed Tools
disallowedTools.description: List of tools that should not be available to Claude

attribution.label: Attribution
attribution.description: Custom attribution string for AI responses

maxFiles.label: Maximum Files to Index
maxFiles.description: Maximum number of files to include in context index

maxFileSize.label: Maximum File Size
maxFileSize.description: Maximum file size to index in bytes (default: 2097152 = 2MB)

allowBrowser.label: Allow Browser Automation
allowBrowser.description: Allow Claude to use browser automation tools
